Reviews.Content: Clean, comfortable place run by very friendly people. Good breakfast each morning... Indoor swimming and WiFi in every room...

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Pet friendly, quiet and good value.”
Reviews.Author: ILTXtravelers
Reviews.Content: We very much enjoyed our stay at the Boxcar Willie Inn. It is hard to find a pet friendly motel that doesn't smell and have evidence of pets having been in the room. We called ahead to see if we could check-in early which they had no problem accomodating that request (but calling in advance is a must) so your room will be ready. Checking-in was quick and easy and we even were given a dog biscuit for our pet. The room was clean, had pet bowls, comfortable beds and everything worked. The location of the motel is nice and quiet. All the staff we came in contact with were very kind and helpful. I had dropped my credit card as I was checking-out and didn't notice until I'd gotten down the road and needed it. I called the Inn and one of the staff had found it and returned it to the front desk. Needless to say I was very relieved and so thankful for the honesty of the staff.

Reviews.Title: “The ONLY place to stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: BransonRadio
Reviews.Content: I have now stayed at the Boxcar Willie Hotel twice and will always stay there ! Terry and Rob are the BEST and the hospitality just can not be beat ! The breakfast is wonderful and they always make you feel at home. The location is great and is off the strip plus is very relaxed and beautiful. Let's talk about the rooms....they are fantastic ! Great beds, coffee makers, refrigerators, hair dryers, nice size TV's, and they are quiet !! The front desk staff are very helpful amd always make sure your stay is perfect. So folks, when you plan your trip to Branosn, call the Boxcar Willie Inn ! We love it !! Gary and Greybeard BransonRadio.com

Reviews.Title: “Best Kept Secret in Branson”
Reviews.Author: jburleson1
Reviews.Content: We stayed four days and had a wonderful time. The people who run the place were people that ran Bed and Beakfasts in California. They run the Hotel the same way with personal care. The breakfast they offered was a lot more than the continental breakfast advertised, and they kept the food coming. It's a pet friendly hotel and when we arrived they gave us a treat for our little dog and a dog toy. When we got to the room the little guy had his own bed and food dishes already set up. The people that ran the hotel were extremely pleasant and very easy to talk to. The Hotel is set off the beaten track and very quite but you are not far from the shows on the Branson strip. When we go to Branson again we will stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Really pleasant stay :0)”
Reviews.Author: Honufan
Reviews.Content: The front desk help was very nice and made checking in pleasant and simple. The room was nice..well appointed and clean..clean...clean. The linens were nice and beds looked clean and inviting. The morning breakfast was ample and tasty. They were trying out new gravies for the biscuits and started serving breakfast sandwiches as well. The location is good and I much prefer it to being out on the main street. I was there for almost a week and I can't find one thing to complain about...It was a nice stay and the staff is wonderful. Thank you Pam and Steve...Rob and Terry for making the Boxcar such a great place to stay..

Reviews.Title: “Nice Get Away”
Reviews.Author: sissygirloo
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the boxcar willie for about a week while on vacation wit a friend. although the front desk people were new they got just waht i wanted. i saw rooms online and they looked just like the on i got. (king suite) i was very pleased with this hote. room service does show every morning so if u want to sleep in dont forget the do not disturb sign. other tahn that the pool was nice, but the hot tub was down. but i had one in my roo so alls good. oh and someone kept taking my parkin spot. there arent assigned ones so first come first serve.. Over all i reccomend this to anyone..

Reviews.Title: “Pet Friendly Hotel”
Reviews.Author: KSMeadowlark
Reviews.Content: We choose Boxcar Willie's because it is a pet friendly motel. The hotel is centrally, conveniently located along the Branson 76 main road, but away from the traffic. The landscaping is pretty. We were greeted by a very nice woman at the reception desk. She gave us a squeeky toy for our pet and a biscuit. The lobby and dining room were clean. The room was acceptable, average for the age of the motel. There was a strong smell of cinnamon when we first opened the room. It was a little overwhelming, so we left the door open while bringing in our bags to air it out a bit. The bedroom and bathroom were clean. There were two bowls for dog food and water on a placemat. Very cute and welcoming for our dog. The continental breakfast which included 3 choices of cereal, milk, 2 choices of juice, coffee, tea, english muffins, bagels, toaster waffles and donuts (no fruit or yogurt) was acceptable. There are fewer and fewer hotels/motels that allow pets because of the inconsiderate pet owners who allow the pet to damage the property, so we are willing to accept what is available. The accommodations and the continental breakfast were acceptable for the price we paid. The people at the reception desk are very friendly and willing to help. We had no complaints and will consider staying here in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Don't Bother”
Reviews.Author: Disappointed1008
Reviews.Content: The room was awful! It didn't look like the picture on the internet and they sprayed some room freshner that had a sickly smell. The hotel was too much off the main drag. I wouldn't stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value!”
Reviews.Author: ALITD
Reviews.Content: We just returned from our first stay at this hotel. What a great value! The room was completely renovated and like new with two queen sized beds. The hotel renovation also included new mattresses, carpets, showers, small fridge, TV, and furniture. We enjoyed the indoor pool and the hot tub. Both had perfect water temperatures (est 76 deg pool and 103 deg hot tub.) The pool will need to have the bottom re-surfaced but is quite large and fully enclosed. They had a complimentary continental breakfast with bagels, waffles, muffins, donuts, dry cereal, coffee, juice and milk. We wish they would of had yogurt and fruit. We enjoyed our four night stay which included two day passes to Silver Dollar City. The hotel web site contains details on the specials. The new owners were very friendly and helpful and appear to be making a significant effort in making this property like new . Overall this was a very clean, quiet, and comfortable experience. Based on the price, this hotel is a great value. We would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “not at all what was advertised”
Reviews.Author: bumbleb143
Reviews.Content: We were scheduled to stay at this hotel for three nights. When we arrived, we found that the "newly renovated rooms" were old and outdated, not to mention musty!!! We were told that we would be able to access the internet however, we were never able to do so. When we questioned this, we were asked what kind of computer we had...not to our suprise, we were told that it didn't work with our brand of computer. When we got ready for bed, we found that the sheets and comforter smelled horribly and did not "smell" like they had been changed. We advised the staff of this and were told that they would put clean sheets on the bed and have our comforter washed...leaving us to think that they are not washed after every use! Needless to say, our trip was less than enjoyable and we left after two nights. We will never stay there again and totally advise against it.

Reviews.Title: “Third Room was a charm”
Reviews.Author: kepMissouri
Reviews.Content: First room we were given was a handicapped room (because I requested to be on a lower level). The smell in the room was unbearable, so we immediately moved to another room. When removing our shoes, we discovered the carpet was soaking wet next to the bathroom, so we moved to yet another. The third room was fine, newly remodeled on the third floor. Staff was nice, breakfast was ok (orange juice was terrible).Housekeeping didn't wash the extra blankets in the room, so we could not use them. The location of the hotel is great, and if we would have had the third room first, our stay would have been much more enjoyable. If you stay at the hotel, don't be afraid to request a different room if there is a problem with the one you are in.

Reviews.Title: “Too high of expectations”
Reviews.Author: KansasSpoon
Reviews.Content: Reading the reviews of this hotel before we booked made me feel that everything would be a lot fancier than is really the case. It is OK, nothing out of the ordinary. On a very positive note, I was able to book my rooms for $44 night with a $50 gas card from Expedia. It is an older motel which was recently remodeled. The beds were fine. The room was clean, but the bathroom had a bad odor. We bought some Lysol and sprayed everything down which helped. The pool was large, but very cold. We did enjoy the whirlpool and sauna. The hotel was busy every day we were there. Breakfast was always packed and not enough chairs. Eat early if want any doughnuts. It is off the strip away from noise which is what I prefer. This is our 4th trip to Branson and the traffic is horrible, so stay off of the strip if possible. I would stay here again if the price was similar to what I paid this time.

Reviews.Title: “stayed 3 nights nice hotel newly renovated, kids loved indoor pool”
Reviews.Author: shazee
Reviews.Content: This was our first stay at this hotel, very affordable, nice large rooms with 2 queen sized beds with very comfortable mattresses and pillows. The hotel had a recent $.25 million renovation and has new carpet and beds and nice furniture. We liked the in room mini fridge and coffee maker and hair dryer. The kids loved the big indoor pool and I loved the jaccuzzi. Room had a 27" TV. They had a free continental breakfast with bagels, frozen waffles, muffins, dry cereal, juice and milk. We wish they would of had bisuits and gravy. We enjoyed our stay and we stayed 3 nights. The staff was very friendly and helpful. We would definitely stay again and we will recieve a 10% discount if we stay again.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel , great stay”
Reviews.Author: bri50
Reviews.Content: stayed for 4 days 3 nights .. hotel was great once you walk in your room it smelled great ,rooms were very clean ..great location.and staff very helpful ...will stay again..my family enjoyed

HotelInfo.Name: Boxcar Willie Inn & Theater
HotelInfo.Address: 360 Schaefer Drive, Branson, MO 65616
